name: Space Junkies (itch) (Vivid Turtle, maxwaeper)
description:
Good news, everyone!  Yet another space junkie joins the intergalactic derby.

We gave you some basic parts from scrap yard, you'll build a spaceship from that and show us fascinating battles with other artificial contenders. Sounds good, yes? You'll start weak and broke like this:

And after each battle you'll get some extra parts from defeated contenders. Put them wherever you like, hell, you can even throw them away, just make sure you're building the most destructive and menacing ship there is! Just look at what I'm flying around destroying other junkies:

Here are a few basic tips for you:

  • You can move around parts outside of the battle however you like. They don't even have to be connected, but that'll look weird.
  • Ship can shoot and ram directly into enemy, balance your build around maximising single damage output or go for balancing different parts.
  • All parts have stats, mouse over particular one to see it's numbers and cool description in the box in the left corner.
  • Individual part stats are summed up when calculating a ship's total stats, no fancy formulas here;
  • Share cool builds in the comments!
